title: Identify this, please: Australian Open logo
content:
Please help me identify the typeface used for the Australian Open logo. Thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013208im_/http:/typophile.com/files/event_logo_3612.png)
author: ihoff

comments.content: Looks like [Dax Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013208/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-dax/) with mods to the 'r' and 'e'.
